text: Chris Evert was the reigning singles champion at the Family Circle Cup tennis tournament, and defended her title, defeating Billie Jean King in the final, 6–0, 6–1. The draw consisted of 32 players of which 8 were seeded. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== === Top half === === Bottom half === ==References== == External links == * International Tennis Federation (ITF) tournament details Brisbane International – Singles
title: 1977 Family Circle Cup – Singles
